Paragraph: 54,55 In contrast , PIDT-C12NT based blend film displayed an interpenetrating bicontinuous network between polymer and PC71BM with optimal domain size of 10-20 nm that is pretty favorable for efficient diffusion of excitons to donor - acceptor interface.

Let's think step by step.

| --- |
| PIDT-C12NT based blend film |
| Polymer |
| PC71BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 54,55 In contrast , PIDT-C12NT based blend film displayed an interpenetrating bicontinuous network between polymer and PC71BM with optimal domain size of 10-20 nm that is pretty favorable for efficient diffusion of excitons to donor - acceptor interface.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| optimal domain size of 10-20 nm |
| interpenetrating bicontinuous network |
| between polymer and PC71BM |
| favorable for efficient diffusion |
| of excitons to donor - acceptor interface |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| optimal domain size of 10-20 nm |
| efficient diffusion of excitons |
| to donor - acceptor interface |

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material properties. "In contrast", "based on", "displayed", "between", "favorable" are descriptive words and do not represent material properties. "PIDT-C12NT", "polymer", and "PC71BM" are types of materials, but the paragraph does not provide enough context to determine specific material properties associated with these materials.
